security-section-items.title: Fully non-custodial
security-section-items.subtitle: The Marinade program is completely permissionless so that anybody can run the bot and “turn the crank”.

security-section-items.title: Audits and code reviews

security-section-items.title: Ecosystem governance
security-section-items.subtitle: Until full DAO, the Marinade program is governed by the most reputable parties of Solana ecosystem.

security-section-items.title: Transparent delegation strategy
security-section-items.subtitle: Staked SOL is delegated to hundreds of validators effectively mitigating any single point of failure risk.
